prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture, chibi proportions with large translucent prismatic interconnected head with unique dodecahedron structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic. Hair or geometric appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal lattice, merkaba patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey inspired by Silver and mid-grey with cool undertones inspired by mercurial ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement, elaborate with shifting Air element glyphs and spiral motifs and dodecahedron emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents with cosmic spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ZAFASAI's profile: 'He who is in emptiness', Aethyr ZEN, Air element, Tarot The Hermit, Sephirot Hod, Zodiac Virgo, embodying the essence: 'In ZAFASAI's presence, solitude feels sacred the air grows still and serene, inviting a detached peace that softens every edge of being.' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.pose: front-facing centered standing pose with one hand raised holding an ethereal lantern, other hand in contemplative gesture
visual_elements.head_shape: large translucent prismatic interconnected head with unique dodecahedron structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with translucent facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth, embodying cosmic
visual_elements.hair_style: geometric appendages incorporating dodecahedron, fractal lattice, merkaba patterns from sacred geometry symbolism

outfit.base: ethereal flowing robes with geometric wind patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for depth and movement
outfit.details: Air element glyphs and spiral motifs
outfit.magical_essence: faint wind wisps and floating geometric particles

visual_elements.accessory: caduceus of communication with intertwined geometric serpents
visual_elements.secondary_color: mid-grey with cool undertones inspired by mercurial
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who is in emptiness'
profile_data.essence: In ZAFASAI's presence, solitude feels sacred the air grows still and serene, inviting a detached peace that softens every edge of being.
profile_data.angelic_role: Archangel of Sacred Solitude; marshals resplendent watchers.
profile_data.form_description: A translucent prismatic structure embodying Air's ethereal nature, composed of interconnected geometric planes that shift and refract light, representing the Hermetic principle of mental clarity and divine intelligence
profile_data.color_reasoning: Silver represents Hod's mercurial intelligence, white symbolizes spiritual purity, azure reflects Air's elemental essence of mental movement and contemplative space
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Dodecahedron represents cosmic intelligence, fractal lattice embodies infinite recursive knowledge, merkaba symbolizes interdimensional consciousness transition
